name: Bully Helps Baldi (Remastered)
description:
This is a remastered version of bully helps baldi.

This is originally a mod where the bully is helping baldi and you need to collect all 7 candy bars. But be careful, the bully and baldi will be chasing you.

Credits:

SplintaDinta for the baldi model.

SuperInky for the bully, test head, and playtime models.

Uberduck for the baldi and bully texts to speech.

Wowzaboi for the student model.

JohnsterSpaceProgram for the disco music.
